items.title: Abrupt mid-term auditor exits rise in FY25; raise governance concerns
items.description: The number of mid-term auditor resignations saw an increase in FY25 when compared to the previous fiscal when 34 such exits were announced.

items.title: Broader markets outperform benchmarks: Here are the top small and midcap gainers
items.description: This comes despite a tepid market sentiment prevailing in the overall market. Sensex rose 300 points to stand at around 80,861, while Nifty 50 was up 0.5 percent to hover around 24,487.

items.title: Live: Nifty Clocks Triple-Digit Gains Driven By Autos, Oil & Gas & Metals| M&M, RR Kabel In Focus
items.description: Nifty logs triple-digit gains; back near 24,500. Midcaps outperform; market breadth strong. NSE advance-decline ratio at almost 3:1. Autos, oil & gas and metals lead gains. Banks sulk; Nifty Bank below 55,000. Catch Nandita Khemka and Yatin Mota as they discuss stocks on their radar.

items.title: Gensol Engineering shares hit lower circuit for 17 consecutive sessions, m-cap sinks 98% from highs
items.description: Gensol Engineering's market-capitalization has sunk from Rs 4,200 crore during highs to Rs 94 crore, falling 98 percent.

items.title: Q4 results impact: Jindal Saw, Utkarsh SFB shares tumble; Gravita India surges 6% after net profit rises 38%
items.description: Utkarsh Small Finance Bank reported a 98 percent YoY fall in net profit to Rs 2.97 crore in Q4 FY25. The lender's net profit however improved sequentially from the Rs 168 crore net loss reported in Q3 FY25.

items.title: Top gainers and losers today: Stocks that moved the most on May 5
items.description: The market rally was primarily driven by easing global trade tensions, which extended the longest winning streak of 2025 so far. Optimism around a potential India-U.S. trade deal further buoyed investor sentiment.
